Table of Contents

Class SpriteText

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Sprites
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A container for simple text rendering purposes. If more complex text rendering is required, use TextFlowContainer instead.

public class SpriteText : Drawable, IDependencyInjectionCandidate, IDisposable, IHasLineBaseHeight, ITexturedShaderDrawable, IHasText, IDrawable, IHasFilterTerms, IFillFlowContainer, ITransformable, IHasCurrentValue<string>, ISourceGeneratedLongRunningLoadCache, ISourceGeneratedHandleInputCache, ISourceGeneratedDependencyActivator

Constructors

SpriteText() 

public SpriteText()

Properties

AllowMultiline

True if the text should be wrapped if it gets too wide. Note that \n does NOT cause a line break. If you need explicit line breaks, use TextFlowContainer instead.

public bool AllowMultiline { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Remarks

If enabled, Truncate will be disabled.

Current

Gets or sets the Bindable<T> that provides the current value.

public Bindable<string> Current { get; set; }

Property Value

Bindable<string>

Remarks

A provided Bindable<T> will be bound to, rather than be stored internally.

EllipsisString

When Truncate is enabled, this decides what string is used to signify that truncation has occured. Defaults to "…".

public string EllipsisString { get; set; }

Property Value

string

FallbackCharacter

The character to fallback to use if a character glyph lookup failed.

protected virtual char FallbackCharacter { get; }

Property Value

char

FilterTerms

An enumerator of relevant terms which match the current object in a filtered scenario.

public IEnumerable<LocalisableString> FilterTerms { get; }

Property Value

IEnumerable<LocalisableString>

FixedWidthExcludeCharacters

The characters that should be excluded from fixed-width application. Defaults to (".", ",", ":", " ") if null.

protected virtual char[] FixedWidthExcludeCharacters { get; }

Property Value

char[]

FixedWidthReferenceCharacter

The character to use to calculate the fixed width width. Defaults to 'm'.

protected virtual char FixedWidthReferenceCharacter { get; }

Property Value

char

Font

Contains information on the font used to display the text.

public FontUsage Font { get; set; }

Property Value

FontUsage

Height

Gets or sets the height of this SpriteText. The SpriteText will maintain this height when set.

public override float Height { get; set; }

Property Value

float

IsPresent

Determines whether this Drawable is present based on its Alpha value. Can be forced always on with AlwaysPresent.

public override bool IsPresent { get; }

Property Value

bool

IsTruncated

When Truncate is enabled, this indicates whether Text has been visually truncated.

protected bool IsTruncated { get; }

Property Value

bool

LineBaseHeight

The line base height this object has.

public float LineBaseHeight { get; }

Property Value

float

MaxWidth

The maximum width of this SpriteText. Affects both auto and fixed sizing modes.

public float MaxWidth { get; set; }

Property Value

float

Remarks

This becomes a relative value if this SpriteText is relatively-sized on the X-axis.

Padding

Shrinks the space which may be occupied by characters of this SpriteText by the specified amount on each side.

public MarginPadding Padding { get; set; }

Property Value

MarginPadding

Shadow

True if a shadow should be displayed around the text.

public bool Shadow { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

ShadowColour

The colour of the shadow displayed around the text. A shadow will only be displayed if the Shadow property is set to true.

public Color4 ShadowColour { get; set; }

Property Value

Color4

ShadowOffset

The offset of the shadow displayed around the text. A shadow will only be displayed if the Shadow property is set to true.

public Vector2 ShadowOffset { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

Size

Gets or sets the size of this SpriteText. The SpriteText will maintain this size when set.

public override Vector2 Size { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

Spacing

Gets or sets the spacing between characters of this SpriteText.

public Vector2 Spacing { get; set; }

Property Value

Vector2

Text

Gets or sets the text to be displayed.

public LocalisableString Text { get; set; }

Property Value

LocalisableString

TextureShader

The shader which should be used for rendering this sprite text.

public IShader TextureShader { get; protected set; }

Property Value

IShader

Remarks

This is automatically populated, but may be overridden if required for special cases. If overriding, set in a BackgroundDependencyLoaderAttribute method or later.

Truncate

If true, text should be truncated when it exceeds the DrawWidth of this SpriteText.

public bool Truncate { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Remarks

Has no effect if no Width or custom sizing is set. If enabled, AllowMultiline will be disabled.

UseFullGlyphHeight

True if the SpriteText's vertical size should be equal to Size (the full height) or precisely the size of used characters. Set to false to allow better centering of individual characters/numerals/etc.

public bool UseFullGlyphHeight { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

Width

Gets or sets the width of this SpriteText. The SpriteText will maintain this width when set.

public override float Width { get; set; }

Property Value

float

Returns

DrawNode

The created draw node.

CreateTextBuilder(ITexturedGlyphLookupStore)

Creates a TextBuilder to generate the character layout for this SpriteText.

protected virtual TextBuilder CreateTextBuilder(ITexturedGlyphLookupStore store)

Parameters

store ITexturedGlyphLookupStore

The ITexturedGlyphLookupStore where characters should be retrieved from.

Returns

TextBuilder

The TextBuilder.

InvalidateTextBuilder()

Invalidates the current TextBuilder, causing a new one to be created next time it's required via CreateTextBuilder(ITexturedGlyphLookupStore).

protected void InvalidateTextBuilder()

LoadComplete()

Invoked after this Drawable has finished loading.

protected override void LoadComplete()

Remarks

This method is invoked on the update thread inside this Drawable's UpdateSubTree().
